title: No Time Like Forever
description: It started with a kiss...Mari Beadie needed a boyfriend, and Chase Miller happened to be in the right place at the right time. The kiss that followed wasn't necessary, strictly speaking, but it sure was hot. Hot enough that when the tables are turned, Chase knows just who to ask to be his pretend girlfriend. Only this time, it's not a one-time deal.
author: Zoe York
